Package gameplay

Class Checkmate

java.lang.Object
gameplay.Checkmate
public class Checkmate extends Object
The Checkmate class contains methods to check if a Piece is under checkmate.
Since:
2022-03-23
Version:
1.0
Author:
Max Zhou (mj94), Dhruv Patel (dvp67)

      public Checkmate()

  • Method Details

    • isCheckmate

      public static boolean isCheckmate(Board board, int[] coords, String turn)
      Returns whether the parameter coordinates are currently under checkmate by enemy pieces
      Parameters:
      board - the board that houses all the pieces
      coords - the row and column coordinates to be checked
      turn - the current color turn (i.e. "White" or "Black")
      Returns:
      if the coordinate on the board is under checkmate

    • checkKing

      public static boolean checkKing(Board board, int[] coords, String turn)
      Check for an enemy king in all square surrounding the specified coordinate
      Parameters:
      board - the board that is currently being played on
      coords - the specified (row,column) coordinates
      turn - the current players turn
      Returns:
      true if there is an enemy King in any of the surrounding squares, false otherwise.

    • checkKnight

      public static boolean checkKnight(Board board, int[] coords, String turn)
      Checks if there are knights that are a threat to a specified square.
      Parameters:
      board - the board that is currently played on
      coords - the specified (row,column) coordinates
      turn - the current player's turn
      Returns:
      true if there is a knight threat, false otherwise.
